definition: a flower may blossom again, but a person cannot get young again (proverb)
pinyin: hua1 you3 chong2 kai1 ri4 , ren2 wu2 zai4 shao4 nian2
traditional: 花有重開日，人無再少年
word: 花有重开日，人无再少年

definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
